code: /* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/heading-has-content */import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import Provinsi from"../Provinsi/Provinsi";import StyledProvinces from"./Province.styled";import{FaMapMarker}from'react-icons/fa';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Provinces=function Provinces(){var tableData=useSelector(function(store){return store.covid.covid;});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StyledProvinces,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Provinsi ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaMapMarker,{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Data Covid Berdasarkan Provinsi"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"No"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Kota"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Kasus"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Sembuh"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Dirawat"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Meninggal"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:tableData.map(function(prov,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Provinsi,{prov:prov,index:index},prov.kota);})})]})})]})})});};export default Provinces;
